title: LinkedIn post by FMP Alliance announcing free Fault Managed Power Systems training

summary: FMP Alliance is hosting a free online training clinic in March 2025 to educate professionals on designing, installing, and maintaining Fault Managed Power Systems. The training responds to industry demand expressed at the Bixie Winter event and will cover codification, safety standards, and design architectures using Class 4 technology, available through fmpalliance.org.

title: RE+ Northeast 2026: Solar Mounts LLC Recap
snippet: The good news is that our own electrical code (the NEC) is adding sections on “Fault-Managed Power” and the focus is on articulation of power. Next. Inside ...
description: Recap of RE+ Northeast 2026 workshop on grid capacity challenges, microgrids, and the future of power distribution including DC grids and Fault-Managed Power.
summary: Solar Mounts LLC attended a workshop at RE+ Northeast 2026 discussing grid capacity challenges and the future need for a hybrid AC/DC 'grid of grids' infrastructure. The presentation highlighted that the NEC is adding sections on Fault-Managed Power with focus on power articulation, driven by massive new electrical demands from AI data centers, EVs, and heat pumps requiring 2-4x current grid capacity.

title: VoltServer Appoints Dave Johnson as Chief Executive Officer
snippet: As the recognized leader in fault-managed power, we enable infrastructure across telecom, transportation, enterprise, and industrial markets to meet the demands ...
description: VoltServer announces Dave Johnson as new CEO to lead growth of Digital Electricity technology, succeeding founder Steve Eaves with over 1,000 global installations.
summary: VoltServer appoints Dave Johnson, former president of Schneider Electric's $7B data center business, as CEO to lead the next phase of growth for its Digital Electricity fault-managed power technology. The company has deployed over 1,000 installations globally.
